articles.author: Stephanie Pappas
articles.title: The Red Sea experienced 'one of the most extreme environmental events on Earth' 6 million years ago - Live Science
articles.description: The Red Sea became a desert about 6.2 million years ago, before a massive flood from the Indian Ocean turned it into a waterway again.
articles.content: The Book of Exodus tells of a miraculous parting of the Red Sea that allowed Moses and the Israelites to escape Egypt. Now, science has an older and more extreme tale to tell: About 6.2 million years… [+2965 chars]
